The collection includes correspondence,newspaper clippings, postcards, and photographs, including daguerreotypes. Most of the collection is about her work with the New Jersey Public Library Commission, but there is some personal and family material.

scopecontent.p: Sarah B. Askew Papers include correspondence,newspaper clippings, postcards, and photographs, including daguerreotypes. Most of the collection is about her work with the New Jersey Public Library Commission, including one letter from Melville Dewey. Also of note is a large collection of postcards she collected while traveling across New Jersey. The personal and family items includes material that predate Askew, including daguerreotypes of unidentified family and friends. There is also material that postdates Askew, including papers relating to her election to the Library Hall of Fame in 1950.
